author: Pierce Moore <me@prex.io>
name: rex-git
description: A toolkit built in Node.js that makes it easy to perform git operations recursively on a folder and its subfolders.

args.list: Find and display all git repos in the current directory or a path, if specified.
args.status: Display the status of all the git repos in the current directory or a path, if specified.
args.pull: Fetch the latest changes for all git repos in the current directory or a path, if specified.
args.dirty: Display all the git repos in the provided directory that are in an unclean state. (No Windows Support yet, sorry!)
